name: Nick Bell
bio: I've been developing in Ruby for 6 years. We use Ruby heavily at GoFan, I am excited to be a mentor.

name: Noah A
bio: I first began programming with Python, but once I tried Ruby I never let go. Ruby has a flexible, elegant syntax, and the community is embracing and amazing. It's the community, for me, that makes me a proud Rubyist.

name: Mikhail Navrotskiy
bio: I am a backend developer with ruby from 4+ years. I love ruby and spend a lot of time on my projects with ruby.
